name: The good neighbour
description:
LD48 - Randy is a simple man. He loves coke, driving hummers and... Surviving the apocalypse !  

An atomic bomb is about to fall and blow his trailer park ! And everyone living in it ! He'll have to scavenge gas to power his drill and dig a nice bunker. He'll also have to gather necessary ressources to survive a long time underground. 

Hurry up ! His fellow rednecks need you !
